example.eg: There are no more mice in the house since I patched up the hole in the wall.
Don't worry, the doctors will patch you up in no time.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 仓促地包扎（或处理）伤口

dsense.name: patch things up, patch it up (with [sb])

example.eg: My friend and I had a fight, but we've patched things up now.
